name: The Art of Eden
description:
The story follows a young Christian boy that goes through anxiety and depression. He is quiet and keeps to himself only talks to the only few close friends he has. He goes through the loss of a loved one and becomes more reserved because of it. Holding on to his faith he goes into drawing to escape reality He imagines a perfect world with no sin with beautiful animals. One day at Church he gets called out to say something in front of the church. He has a nervous breakdown in front of the church. And one thing leads to another, and the world becomes enveloped in the boy's imagination. Everyone who was filled with corruption in their hearts conformed to the world fell into a deep sleep. Leaving only the people with a pure heart who that had some relation to the boy. They go in search of the boy and discover the mystery of the surrounding land and grow in their Christ along the way.

This is the demo version of the game. Please give feedback if u can.
